pages.text: $(li)The Blobfish is an item that can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/fish_oil)Fish Oil$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)Blobfish may drop this item upon death.$(br)$(li)Do not try to eat it!$(br)It can be $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)poisonous$(/l).
